execution_plan.description: Find users in the application DB who have at least one post (active by posts). Returns user id, username and email from app.users for users referenced in app.posts.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email FROM users u WHERE u.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM posts);

execution_plan.description: Find users in the chat DB who have sent at least one message (active by messages). Returns user id, username and full_name from app_chat.users for users referenced in app_chat.messages.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.full_name FROM users u WHERE u.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT sended_by FROM messages);
